donation.title: Donate for a Cause
donation.content: Support our mission to make a difference in the world.

faqs.question: How can I donate?
faqs.answer: You can donate using our secure online payment platform.

faqs.question: Is my donation tax-deductible?
faqs.answer: Yes, your donation is tax-deductible to the extent allowed by law.

faqs.question: Where does my donation go?
faqs.answer: Your donation goes directly to fund our charitable projects.

faqs.question: Can I make a monthly donation?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can choose to make a monthly recurring donation.

rewards.title: Bronze Supporter
rewards.content: Receive a thank-you email and recognition on our website.

rewards.title: Silver Supporter
rewards.content: In addition to Bronze benefits, get a personalized certificate.

rewards.title: Gold Supporter
rewards.content: In addition to Silver benefits, receive a special gift.

rewards.title: Platinum Supporter
rewards.content: In addition to Gold benefits, join our exclusive supporters club.
